title.rendered: 25-26 JULY 2018: CAPACITY BUILDING, FIGHT AGAINST VIOLENT EXTREMISM AND THE INVOLVEMENT OF CHILDREN IN ARMED GROUPS

content.rendered: The project aimed at contributing to the better engagement of children in the fight against violent extremism that is why we organize this educational discussion. Through cartoons both on papers and t-shirts in order to stimulate the engagement of children in the fight against violent extremism. The project was designed for street children. It contributed to build the capacity of 100 children on fight against violent extremism and the involvement of children in armed groups.
